title: Dramatic housing transformation in sub-Saharan Africa revealed for first time

title_detail.value: Dramatic housing transformation in sub-Saharan Africa revealed for first time

summary: Housing with improved water and sanitation, sufficient living area and durable construction has doubled in sub-Saharan Africa between 2000 and 2015, according to new research.

summary_detail.value: Housing with improved water and sanitation, sufficient living area and durable construction has doubled in sub-Saharan Africa between 2000 and 2015, according to new research.
